COMPONENT NAME: CKM Oracle
AUTHOR: Oracle
DESCRIPTION - Check Knowledge Module for Oracle - This module controls the validity of the constraints of a Datastore and rejects the invalid records in an error table. It can be used for static controls as well as flow controls. - This module creates non unique index on the I$ table before checking AK and PK and an index on the E$ table before removing erroneous records from I$ table.
RESTRICTIONS - Data cleansing can be performed only if an update key is defined on the controlled table. - This Knowledge Module uses Oracle RowId column for data cleansing.
OPTIONS (Refer to Option descriptions for more information on each option) - DROP_ERROR_TABLE: When this option is set to YES, the error table will be dropped each time a control is performed on the target table. This means that any rejected records, identified and stored during previous control operations, will be lost. - DROP_CHECK_TABLE: When this option is set to YES, the SNP_CHECK_TAB check table (which is created in the default Physical Schema of the Physical Server that hosts the controlled table) will be dropped each time a control is performed on the target table. This table contains a collection of all rejected records retrieved from all datastores hosted on the same Physical Server (whatever the Physical Schema may be). - UPGRADE_ERROR_TABLE: When this option is set to YES, the existing E$ table will be upgraded to the new E$ table structure.

When this option is set to YES, the error table will be dropped each time a control is performed on the target table. This means that any rejected records, identified and stored during previous control operations, will be lost.

When this option is set to YES, the SNP_CHECK_TAB check table (which is created in the default Physical Schema of the Physical Server that hosts the controlled table) will be dropped each time a control is performed on the target table. This table contains a collection of all rejected records retrieved from all datastores hosted on the same Physical Server (whatever the Physical Schema may be).
Create Index on the error table

set this Option to Yes for creating a non unique indexes on the Error table.
Note: When error table is not dropped at every execution (DROP_ERROR_TABLE=Yes), insert performance into error table may decrease due to this index.

This option affects the use of PURGE key word:
Values PURGE 10 Yes 9 No

This option generates an extra validation step during development. Validations performed are: - validation of KM option COMPATIBLE
This option should be turned off for all production use in particular for high-frequency execution. There is not added value in production, only processing overhead.

In case you use this CKM in an Oracle DB 11R2 or later environment with Editions activated and data is accessed through editioning views instead of directly through tables, you should consider activating this option. Please see KM reference guide for details.
When this option is set to YES, the existing E$ table will be upgraded to the new E$ table structure.

delete from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","CHECK_NAME", "W")%> where SCHEMA_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getTargetTable("SCHEMA")%>' and ORIGIN = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ORIGIN")%>' and ERR_TYPE = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ERR_TYPE")%>'

<% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("0")) { 
/* No edition support needed */ %>
drop table <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%> <% if (new Integer(odiRef.getOption( "COMPATIBLE" )).intValue() >= 10 ) { out.print( "purge" ); }; %>
<% } else { 
/* Edition support needed */
%>
declare
	viewExists	NUMBER(1,0);
	tableExists	NUMBER(1,0);
	baseTableName	VARCHAR2(100 CHAR);
begin	
	-- Check, if old non-EV-support error table already exists
	select 	count('X') 
	into	tableExists
	from 	ALL_TABLES
	where 	OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>'
	and		TABLE_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%>';
	
	if tableExists > 0
		begin
			execute immediate 'drop table <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%> purge';
		end
	else
		begin
			-- Check, if error view already exists
			select 	count('X') 
			into	viewExists
			from 	ALL_VIEWS 
			where 	OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>'
			and		VIEW_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%>';
			
			if viewExists > 0
				begin
					select	OWNER||'.'||TABLE_NAME
					into 	baseTableName
					from 	ALL_EDITIONING_VIEWS_AE
					where 	OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>'
					and		VIEW_NAME = '<%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%>';
					and		EDITION_NAME = sys_context('userenv', 'current_edition_name');
					
					execute immediate 'drop table '|| baseTableName ||' purge';
					execute immediate 'drop view <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%> purge';
				end
			end if;
		end
	end if;
	
<%};%>

<% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("0")) { /* No edition support needed */ %> create table <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%> ( ODI_ROW_ID UROWID, ODI_ERR_TYPE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "1", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ODI_ERR_MESS <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "250", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ODI_CHECK_DATE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE", "", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]\t[DEST_WRI_DT] " + odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL"), ",\n\t", "", "")%>, ODI_ORIGIN <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ODI_CONS_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "128", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ODI_CONS_TYPE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ODI_PK <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "32", "")%> PRIMARY KEY, ODI_SESS_NO <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "19", "")%> ) <% } else { /* Edition support needed */ %> declare viewExists NUMBER(1,0); tableExists NUMBER(1,0); baseTableName VARCHAR2(100 CHAR); begin -- Check, if old non-EV-support error table already exists select count('X') into tableExists from ALL_TABLES where OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>' and TABLE_NAME = substr('<%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME","W")%>', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("W")%>')+2);
-- Check, if error view already exists select count('X') into viewExists from ALL_EDITIONING_VIEWS_AE where owner = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>' and view_name = substr('<%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME","W")%>', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("W")%>')+2);
-- Generate a GUID base table name <? String tableName = java.util.UUID.randomUUID().toString().toUpperCase().replace('-','_'); ?> baseTableName := '<?=odiRef.getObjectName("L","%ERR_PRF"+tableName, "W")?>';
if tableExists > 0 then execute immediate 'alter table <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%> to '|| baseTableName; else begin execute immediate 'create table '|| baseTableName ||' '|| '( ' || ' ODI_ROW_ID UROWID, ' || ' ODI_ERR_TYPE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "1", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ' || ' ODI_ERR_MESS <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "250", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ' || ' ODI_CHECK_DATE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE", "", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ' || ' <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]\t[DEST_WRI_DT] " + odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL"), ",\n\t", "", "")%>, ' || ' ODI_ORIGIN <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ' || ' ODI_CONS_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "128", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ' || ' ODI_CONS_TYPE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ' || ' ODI_PK <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "32", "")%> PRIMARY KEY, '|| ' ODI_SESS_NO <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "19", "")%>'
')'; end; end if;
-- Create EV view on Guid error table execute immediate 'create or replace view <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME","W")%> as ' || 'select ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ' || '<%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ", ", "", "")%>, ' || 'ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE,ODI_PK,ODI_SESS_NO ' || 'from '|| baseTableName ;
end;
<%};%>

delete from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%> where (ODI_ERR_TYPE = 'S' and '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ERR_TYPE")%>' = 'S') or (ODI_ERR_TYPE = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ERR_TYPE")%>' and ODI_ORIGIN = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ORIGIN")%>')

<% if ("F".equals(odiRef.getInfo("CT_ERR_TYPE"))) { %> /* FLOW CONTROL CREATE THE iNDEX ON THE I$TABLE */ create index <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "W").replaceAll((char)34+"\Q%INT_PRF"+odiRef.getInfo("TARG_NAME")+"\E"+(char)34, (char)34+"%INT_PRF"+odiRef.getInfo("TARG_NAME")+"_IDX"+(char)34)%> on <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","W")%> (<%=odiRef.getColList("","[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t", "", "PK")%>) <% } %>

insert into <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%> ( ODI_PK, ODI_SESS_NO, ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "MAP")%> ) select SYS_GUID(), <%=odiRef.getSession("SESS_NO")%>, rowid, '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ERR_TYPE")%>', '<%=odiRef.getPK("MESS")%>', '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ORIGIN")%>', <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DATE_FCT")%>, '<%=odiRef.getPK("KEY_NAME")%>', 'PK', <%=odiRef.getColList("", odiRef.getTargetTable("TABLE_ALIAS")+".[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "MAP")%> from <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "CT_NAME", "A")%> <%=odiRef.getTargetTable("TABLE_ALIAS")%> where exists ( select <%=odiRef.getColList("", "SUB.[COL_NAME]", ",
			", "", "PK")%> from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","CT_NAME","A")%> SUB where <%=odiRef.getColList("", "SUB.[COL_NAME]="+odiRef.getTargetTable("TABLE_ALIAS")+".[COL_NAME]", "
			and ", "", "PK")%> group by <%=odiRef.getColList("", "SUB.[COL_NAME]", ",
			", "", "PK")%> having count(1) > 1 ) <%=odiRef.getFilter()%>

<% if ("F".equals(odiRef.getInfo("CT_ERR_TYPE"))) { %> /* FLOW CONTROL CREATE THE iNDEX ON THE I$TABLE */ create index <%=odiRef.getAK("KEY_NAME")%>_flow on <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","W")%> (<%=odiRef.getAKColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t\t", "")%>) <% } %>

insert into <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%> ( ODI_PK, ODI_SESS_NO, ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "MAP")%> ) select SYS_GUID(), <%=odiRef.getSession("SESS_NO")%>, rowid, '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ERR_TYPE")%>', '<%=odiRef.getAK("MESS")%>', '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ORIGIN")%>', <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DATE_FCT")%>, '<%=odiRef.getAK("KEY_NAME")%>', 'AK', <%=odiRef.getColList("", odiRef.getTargetTable("TABLE_ALIAS")+".[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "MAP")%> from <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "CT_NAME", "A")%> <%=odiRef.getTargetTable("TABLE_ALIAS")%> where exists ( select <%=odiRef.getAKColList("", "SUB.[COL_NAME]", ",
			", "")%> from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","CT_NAME","A")%> SUB where <%=odiRef.getAKColList("", "SUB.[COL_NAME]="+odiRef.getTargetTable("TABLE_ALIAS")+".[COL_NAME]", "
			and ", "")%> group by <%=odiRef.getAKColList("", "SUB.[COL_NAME]", ",
			", "")%> having count(1) > 1 ) <%=odiRef.getFilter()%>

insert into <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%> ( ODI_PK, ODI_SESS_NO, ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "MAP")%> ) select SYS_GUID(), <%=odiRef.getSession("SESS_NO")%>, rowid, '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ERR_TYPE")%>', '<%=odiRef.getFK("MESS")%>', <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DATE_FCT")%>, '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ORIGIN")%>', '<%=odiRef.getFK("FK_NAME")%>', 'FK', <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "MAP")%> <%if (odiRef.getFK("COMPLEX_SQL").equals("")) {%> from <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "CT_NAME", "A")%> <%=odiRef.getTargetTable("TABLE_ALIAS")%> where ( <%=odiRef.getFKColList("",odiRef.getTargetTable("TABLE_ALIAS")+".[COL_NAME] ", ",
		", "")%> ) not in ( select <%=odiRef.getFKColList("", "[PK_COL_NAME]", ",
			", "")%> from <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "FK_PK_TABLE_NAME", "A")%> ) and ( <%=odiRef.getFKColList("",odiRef.getTargetTable("TABLE_ALIAS")+".[COL_NAME] is not null ", "
	and	", "")%> ) <%=odiRef.getFilter()%> <%}else{%> from <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "CT_NAME", "A")%> <%=odiRef.getFK("FK_ALIAS")%> where not exists ( select 'X' from <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "FK_PK_TABLE_NAME", "A")%> <%=odiRef.getFK("PK_ALIAS")%> where <%=odiRef.getFK("COMPLEX_SQL")%> ) <%=odiRef.getFilter()%> <%}%>

insert into <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%> ( ODI_PK, ODI_SESS_NO, ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "", "MAP")%> ) select SYS_GUID(), <%=odiRef.getSession("SESS_NO")%>, rowid, '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ERR_TYPE")%>', '<%=odiRef.getCK("MESS")%>', <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DATE_FCT")%>, '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ORIGIN")%>', '<%=odiRef.getCK("COND_NAME")%>', 'CK', <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "", "MAP")%> from <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "CT_NAME", "A")%> <%=odiRef.getCK("COND_ALIAS")%> where not ( <%=odiRef.getCK("COND_SQL")%> ) <%=odiRef.getFilter()%>

insert into <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%> ( ODI_PK, ODI_SESS_NO, ODI_ROW_ID, ODI_ERR_TYPE, ODI_ERR_MESS, ODI_CHECK_DATE, ODI_ORIGIN, ODI_CONS_NAME, ODI_CONS_TYPE, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "", "MAP")%> ) select SYS_GUID(), <%=odiRef.getSession("SESS_NO")%>, rowid, '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ERR_TYPE")%>', '<%=odiRef.getNotNullCol("MESS")%>', <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DATE_FCT")%>, '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ORIGIN")%>', '<%=odiRef.getNotNullCol("COL_NAME")%>', 'NN', <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "", "MAP")%> from <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "CT_NAME", "A")%> where <%=odiRef.getNotNullCol("COL_NAME")%> is null <%=odiRef.getFilter()%>

<% if ("F".equals(odiRef.getInfo("CT_ERR_TYPE"))) { %> /* FLOW CONTROL CREATE INDEX ON THE E$TABLE */ create index <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "ERR_NAME", "W").replaceAll((char)34+"\Q%ERR_PRF"+odiRef.getInfo("TARG_NAME")+"\E"+(char)34, (char)34+"%ERR_PRF"+odiRef.getInfo("TARG_NAME")+"_IDX"+(char)34)%> on <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME","W")%> (ODI_ROW_ID) <% } %>

delete from <$=<%=odiRef.getTable("L", "CT_NAME", "A")%>$><@if (#SIG.vStgNumLote>0) { @>_#SIG.vStgNumLote<@}@> T where exists ( select 1 from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%> E where ODI_SESS_NO = <%=odiRef.getSession("SESS_NO")%> and T.rowid = E.ODI_ROW_ID )
insert check sum into check table

insert into <%=odiRef.getTable("L","CHECK_NAME", "W")%> ( SCHEMA_NAME, RESOURCE_NAME, FULL_RES_NAME, ERR_TYPE, ERR_MESS, CHECK_DATE, ORIGIN, CONS_NAME, CONS_TYPE, ERR_COUNT ) select '<%=odiRef.getTargetTable("SCHEMA")%>', '<%=odiRef.getTargetTable("TABLE_NAME")%>', '<%=odiRef.getTable("L","TARG_NAME","A")%>', E.ODI_ERR_TYPE, E.ODI_ERR_MESS, E.ODI_CHECK_DATE, E.ODI_ORIGIN, E.ODI_CONS_NAME, E.ODI_CONS_TYPE, count(1) from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%> E where E.ODI_ERR_TYPE = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ERR_TYPE")%>' and E.ODI_ORIGIN = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ORIGIN")%>' group by E.ODI_ERR_TYPE, E.ODI_ERR_MESS, E.ODI_CHECK_DATE, E.ODI_ORIGIN, E.ODI_CONS_NAME, E.ODI_CONS_TYPE

<% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("0")){ /* No Editioning View Support */ %> create table <%=odiRef.getTable("L","CHECK_NAME","W")%> ( CATALOG_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%> , SCHEMA_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%> , RESOURCE_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, FULL_RES_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ERR_TYPE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "1", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ERR_MESS <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "250", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%> , CHECK_DATE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE", "", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ORIGIN <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, CONS_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "128", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, CONS_TYPE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>, ERR_COUNT <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "10", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%> ) <% } else { /* Editioning View support enabled */ %>
DECLARE
oldtableExists NUMBER(1,0); newtableExists NUMBER(1,0);
BEGIN
-- Check, if old non-EV-support check table already exists select count('X') into oldtableExists from all_tables where owner = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>' and table_name = substr('<%=odiRef.getTable("L","CHECK_NAME","W")%>', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("W")%>')+2);
-- Check, if EV-support check table already exists select count('X') into newtableExists from all_tables where owner = '<%=odiRef.getSchemaNameDefaultPSchema("W")%>' and table_name = substr('<%=odiRef.getTable("L","CHECK_NAME","W")%>', length('<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("W")%>')+2)||'_AE';
IF oldtableExists > 0 THEN -- Auto-Upgrade from previous setup with ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT=No execute immediate 'alter table <%=odiRef.getTable("L","CHECK_NAME","W")%> add EDITION_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR" , "30", "0" )%> default sys_context(''userenv'', ''current_edition_name'')'; execute immediate 'alter table <%=odiRef.getTable("L","CHECK_NAME","W")%> to substr(''<%=odiRef.getTable("L","CHECK_NAME","W")%>'', length(''<%=odiRef.getSchemaName("W")%>'')+2)_AE'; ELSIF newtableExists = 0 THEN -- Create table execute immediate 'create table <%=odiRef.getTable("L","CHECK_NAME","W")%>_AE (' || ' EDITION_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR" , "30", "0" )%> default sys_context(''userenv'', ''current_edition_name''),' || ' CATALOG_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>,' || ' SCHEMA_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%> ,' || ' RESOURCE_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>,' || ' FULL_RES_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>,' || ' ERR_TYPE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "1", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>,' || ' ERR_MESS <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "250", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%> ,' || ' CHECK_DATE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE", "", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>,' || ' ORIGIN <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "100", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>,' || ' CONS_NAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "128", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>,' || ' CONS_TYPE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>,' || ' ERR_COUNT <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "10", "")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL")%>' || ' )'; END IF;
-- Create view returning only check records of current edition execute immediate 'create or replace view <%=odiRef.getTable("L","CHECK_NAME","W")%> as' || ' select EDITION_NAME, CATALOG_NAME, SCHEMA_NAME, RESOURCE_NAME, FULL_RES_NAME, ERR_TYPE, ERR_MESS, CHECK_DATE, ORIGIN, CONS_NAME, CONS_TYPE, ERR_COUNT' || ' from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","CHECK_NAME","W")%>_AE' || ' where EDITION_NAME = sys_context(''userenv'', ''current_edition_name'')'; END; <% }; %>

<$
import Java.lang.*;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

//Clase Campo representa un campo y los atributos del mismo
public class Campo {
    private String vNombreCampo = "";
    private String vTipoCampo = "";
    private Integer vNumero = 0;
    private String vDescCampo = "";
    private String vNombreCampoUltHab = "";
    private String vNombreCampoAcum = "";
    private String vNombreCampoCurr = "";
    private String vNombreCampoPrior = "";
    private String vNombreCamposSm = "";
    private String vNombreCamposSmCurr = "";
    private String vNombreCamposSmPrior = "";
    private String vFlagCambioInteres = "";
    
    public void SetNombreCampo (String vNombreCampo) {this.vNombreCampo = vNombreCampo;}
    public void SetNombreCampo (String vNombreCampo, int vNumero) {
        this.vNombreCampo = vNombreCampo;
        this.vNombreCampoUltHab = vNombreCampo.length() > 26  ? vNombreCampo.substring(0,26) + "_UH" + vNumero : vNombreCampo + "_UH" + vNumero;
        this.vNombreCampoAcum = vNombreCampo.length() > 26  ? vNombreCampo.substring(0,26) + "_AC" + vNumero : vNombreCampo + "_AC" + vNumero;
        this.vNombreCampoCurr = vNombreCampo.length() > 25  ? vNombreCampo.substring(0,25) + "_C_AC" + vNumero : vNombreCampo + "_C_AC" + vNumero;
        this.vNombreCampoPrior = vNombreCampo.length() > 25  ? vNombreCampo.substring(0,25) + "_P_AC" + vNumero : vNombreCampo + "_P_AC" + vNumero;
    }
    public String GetNombreCampo () {return this.vNombreCampo;}
    public void SetTipoCampo (String vTipoCampo) {this.vTipoCampo = vTipoCampo;}
    public String GetTipoCampo () {return this.vTipoCampo;}
    public void SetNumero (Integer vNumero) {this.vNumero = vNumero;}
    public Integer GetNumero () {return this.vNumero;}
    public void SetDescCampo (String vDescCampo) {this.vDescCampo = vDescCampo;}
    public String GetDescCampo () {return this.vDescCampo;}
    public void SetNombreCampoUltHab (String vNombreCampoUltHab) {this.vNombreCampoUltHab = vNombreCampoUltHab;}
    public String GetNombreCampoUltHab () {return this.vNombreCampoUltHab;}
    public void SetNombreCampoAcum (String vNombreCampoAcum) {this.vNombreCampoAcum = vNombreCampoAcum;}
    public String GetNombreCampoAcum () {return this.vNombreCampoAcum;}
    public void SetNombreCampoCurr (String vNombreCampoCurr) {this.vNombreCampoCurr = vNombreCampoCurr;}
    public String GetNombreCampoCurr () {return this.vNombreCampoCurr;}
    public void SetNombreCampoPrior (String vNombreCampoPrior) {this.vNombreCampoPrior = vNombreCampoPrior;}
    public String GetNombreCampoPrior () {return this.vNombreCampoPrior;}
    public void SetNombreCamposSm (String vNombreCamposSm) {
        this.vNombreCamposSm = vNombreCamposSm;
        this.vNombreCamposSm = this.vNombreCamposSmPrior.length() > 0 ? this.vNombreCamposSm + "@PRIOR@" + this.vNombreCamposSmPrior : this.vNombreCamposSm;
        this.vNombreCamposSm = this.vNombreCamposSmCurr.length() > 0 ? this.vNombreCamposSm + "@CURR@" + this.vNombreCamposSmCurr : this.vNombreCamposSm;
    }
    public String GetNombreCamposSm () {return this.vNombreCamposSm;}
    public void SetNombreCamposSmCurr (String vNombreCamposSmCurr) {this.vNombreCamposSmCurr = vNombreCamposSmCurr;}
    public String GetNombreCamposSmCurr () {return this.vNombreCamposSmCurr;}
    public void SetNombreCamposSmPrior (String vNombreCamposSmPrior) {this.vNombreCamposSmPrior = vNombreCamposSmPrior;}
    public String GetNombreCamposSmPrior () {return this.vNombreCamposSmPrior;}
    public void SetFlagCambioInteres (String vFlagCambioInteres) {this.vFlagCambioInteres = vFlagCambioInteres;}
    public String GetFlagCambioInteres () {return this.vFlagCambioInteres;}
}

public static void getCampos(String vStr, String vTipoCampo, String vSeparador, String vInicio, String vFin, String vIdentacion){
    String vStrAux = vStr;
    Campo vCampoAux;
    String vNumero = "";
    String vFlagInicio = "false"; //Flag que indica cuando empieza el tipo de campo que se quiere imprimir
    boolean vFlagImprimir = false; //Indica cuando se debe imprimir o no un campo
    //Indica si el string vStr ingresado contiene saldos de reprecio (CURR o PRIOR) lo cual requiere de procesamiento adicional
    boolean vFlagSaldoReprecio = vStr.contains("[SALDO_CURR]") || vStr.contains("[SALDO_PRIOR]") || vStr.contains("[SALDO_PUNT_REPRE]") || vStr.contains("[SALDO_ULT_REPRE]") ? true: false; 
    int vNumSaldosReprecio = 0;
    
    //Si vStr contiene saldos de reprecio se cuentan cuantos saldos de reprecio tiene
    Iterator vIterator = vListaCampos.iterator();
    if (vFlagSaldoReprecio) {
      while (vIterator.hasNext()) {
        vCampoAux = vIterator.next();
        vNumSaldosReprecio = vCampoAux.GetFlagCambioInteres().length() > 0 ? vNumSaldosReprecio + 1: vNumSaldosReprecio;
      }
    }	
    
    vIterator = vListaCampos.iterator();
    Iterator vIterator2 = vListaCampos.iterator();
    if (vIterator2.hasNext()) {vIterator2.next();}
    while (vIterator.hasNext()) {
        vCampoAux = vIterator.next();
        vStrAux = vStr;
        vNumero = vCampoAux.GetNumero() > 1  ? "" + vCampoAux.GetNumero() : "";
        
        if (vTipoCampo.equals("SALDO_PUNTUAL") && vCampoAux.GetTipoCampo().equals("SALDO_PUNTUAL")) {
            vStrAux = vStrAux.replace("[SALDO_PUNT]", vCampoAux.GetNombreCampo());
            vStrAux = vStrAux.replace("[SALDO_ACUM]", vCampoAux.GetNombreCampoAcum());
            vStrAux = vStrAux.replace("[SALDO_ULT]", vCampoAux.GetNombreCampoUltHab());
            vStrAux = vStrAux.replace("[SALDO_DESC]", vCampoAux.GetDescCampo());
            vStrAux = vStrAux.replace("[SALDO_CURR]", vCampoAux.GetNombreCampoCurr());
            vStrAux = vStrAux.replace("[SALDO_PRIOR]", vCampoAux.GetNombreCampoPrior());
            vStrAux = vStrAux.replace("[SALDO_NUM]", "" + vCampoAux.GetNumero());
            vStrAux = vStrAux.replace("[FLAG_REPRECIO]", vCampoAux.GetFlagCambioInteres());
            vStrAux = vStrAux.replace("[SALDO_PUNT_REPRE]", vCampoAux.GetNombreCampo());
            vStrAux = vStrAux.replace("[SALDO_ULT_REPRE]", vCampoAux.GetNombreCampoUltHab());
            vFlagImprimir = true;
            if (vFlagSaldoReprecio && vCampoAux.GetFlagCambioInteres().length() == 0) {vFlagImprimir = false;}
            if (vFlagSaldoReprecio && vCampoAux.GetFlagCambioInteres().length() > 0) {vNumSaldosReprecio = vNumSaldosReprecio -1;}
            if (vFlagInicio.equals("false") && vFlagImprimir) {vFlagInicio = "true";}
        } 
        else if(vTipoCampo.equals("CLAVE_PRODUCTO") && vCampoAux.GetTipoCampo().equals("CLAVE_PRODUCTO")) {
            vStrAux = vStrAux.replace("[CLAVE_PROD]", vCampoAux.GetNombreCampo());
            vStrAux = vStrAux.replace("[CLAVE_PROD_SM]", "CLAVE_PROD" + vNumero);
            vStrAux = vStrAux.replace("[CLAVE_DESC]", vCampoAux.GetDescCampo());
            vStrAux = vStrAux.replace("[CLAVE_PROD_NUM]", "" + vCampoAux.GetNumero());
  	          vFlagImprimir = true;
            vFlagInicio = vFlagInicio.equals("false") ? "true": "NA";
        }
        else if(vTipoCampo.equals("FECHA_REPRECIO") && vCampoAux.GetTipoCampo().equals("FECHA_REPRECIO")) {
            vStrAux = vStrAux.replace("[FECHA_REPRECIO]", vCampoAux.GetNombreCampo());
            vStrAux = vStrAux.replace("[FECHA_REPRECIO_DESC]", vCampoAux.GetDescCampo());
            vStrAux = vStrAux.replace("[FECHA_REPRECIO_NUM]", "" + vCampoAux.GetNumero());
            vFlagImprimir = true;
            vFlagInicio = vFlagInicio.equals("false") ? "true": "NA";
        }
        else if(vTipoCampo.equals("TIPO_INTERES") && vCampoAux.GetTipoCampo().equals("TIPO_INTERES")) {
            vStrAux = vStrAux.replace("[TIPO_INTERES]", vCampoAux.GetNombreCampo());
            vStrAux = vStrAux.replace("[TIPO_INTERES_DESC]", vCampoAux.GetDescCampo());
            vStrAux = vStrAux.replace("[TIPO_INTERES_NUM]", "" + vCampoAux.GetNumero());
            vFlagImprimir = true;
            vFlagInicio = vFlagInicio.equals("false") ? "true": "NA";
        }
        else if(vTipoCampo.equals("FECHA_PROX_REPRE") && vCampoAux.GetTipoCampo().equals("FECHA_PROX_REPRE")) {
            vStrAux = vStrAux.replace("[FECHA_PROX_REPRE]", vCampoAux.GetNombreCampo());
            vStrAux = vStrAux.replace("[FECHA_PROX_REPRE_DESC]", vCampoAux.GetDescCampo());
            vStrAux = vStrAux.replace("[FECHA_PROX_REPRE_NUM]", "" + vCampoAux.GetNumero());
            vFlagImprimir = true;
            vFlagInicio = vFlagInicio.equals("false") ? "true": "NA";
        }
		
        if (vFlagImprimir) {		
            if (vFlagInicio.equals("true") && vIterator.hasNext()) {
                vFlagInicio = "NA";
                if ((vIterator2.next().GetTipoCampo().equals(vCampoAux.GetTipoCampo()) && !vFlagSaldoReprecio) || (vFlagSaldoReprecio && vNumSaldosReprecio > 0)) {
                  if (vCampoAux.GetNombreCampo().length() > 0) {out.println(vInicio + vStrAux + vSeparador);}
                } 
                else {
                  if (vCampoAux.GetNombreCampo().length() > 0) {out.print(vInicio + vStrAux + vFin); break;}
                }
            }
            else if (vFlagInicio.equals("true") && !vIterator.hasNext()) {
                vFlagInicio = "NA";
                if (vCampoAux.GetNombreCampo().length() > 0) {out.print(vInicio + vStrAux + vFin); break;}
            }
            else if (!vFlagInicio.equals("true") && !vIterator.hasNext()) {
                if (vCampoAux.GetNombreCampo().length() > 0) {out.print(vIdentacion + vStrAux + vFin); break;}
            }
            else if (!vFlagInicio.equals("true") && vIterator.hasNext()) {
                if ((vIterator2.next().GetTipoCampo().equals(vCampoAux.GetTipoCampo()) && !vFlagSaldoReprecio) || (vFlagSaldoReprecio && vNumSaldosReprecio > 0)) {
                  if (vCampoAux.GetNombreCampo().length() > 0) {out.println(vIdentacion + vStrAux + vSeparador);}
                } 
                else {
                  if (vCampoAux.GetNombreCampo().length() > 0) {out.print(vIdentacion + vStrAux + vFin); break;}
                }
            }		
        }
        else { if (vIterator2.hasNext()) {vIterator2.next();}}
        vFlagImprimir = false;
    }
}

public void consultarCampos(ArrayList vListaCampos) {
    Campo vCampoAux;
   <%
    int vNumClaveProd = 0;
    //Obtener campos de clave producto
    for (int i = 1; i <= 1; i++) {
      for (int j = i + 1; j <= 6; j++) {
          vNumClaveProd = vNumClaveProd + 1;
          out.println("vCampoAux = new Campo(); ");
          out.println("vCampoAux.SetNumero(" + vNumClaveProd + "); ");
          out.println("vCampoAux.SetTipoCampo(" + '"' + "CLAVE_PRODUCTO" + '"' + "); ");
          out.println("vCampoAux.SetNombreCampo(" + '"' + odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", "@", "", "((INS and !TRG) and REW and UPD and UD" + i + " and UD" + j + ")") + '"' + ", " + vNumClaveProd + ");");
          out.println("vCampoAux.SetDescCampo(" + '"' + odiRef.getColList("", "[DEST_CRE_DT]", "@", "", "((INS and !TRG) and REW and UPD and UD" + i + " and UD" + j + ")") + '"' +");");
          out.println("if (vCampoAux.GetNombreCampo().length() > 0) {vListaCampos.add(vCampoAux);}");
      }
    }
    %>
    <%
    int vNumSaldoPunt = 0;
    //Obtener campos de saldo puntual
    for (int i = 1; i <= 6; i++) {
      for (int j = i + 1; j <= 7; j++) {
          vNumSaldoPunt = vNumSaldoPunt + 1;
          out.println("vCampoAux = new Campo(); ");
          out.println("vCampoAux.SetNumero(" + vNumSaldoPunt + "); ");
          out.println("vCampoAux.SetTipoCampo(" + '"' + "SALDO_PUNTUAL" + '"' + "); ");
          out.println("vCampoAux.SetFlagCambioInteres(" + '"' + odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", "@", "", "((INS and !TRG) and REW and !UPD and UD" + i + " and UD" + j + " and UD9)") + '"' + "); ");
          out.println("vCampoAux.SetNombreCampo(" + '"' + odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", "@", "", "((INS and !TRG) and REW and !UPD and UD" + i + " and UD" + j + ")") + '"' + ", " + vNumSaldoPunt + ");");
          out.println("vCampoAux.SetDescCampo(" + '"' + odiRef.getColList("", "[DEST_CRE_DT]", "@", "", "((INS and !TRG) and REW and !UPD and UD" + i + " and UD" + j + ")") + '"' + ");");
          out.println("if (vCampoAux.GetNombreCampo().length() > 0) {vListaCampos.add(vCampoAux);}");
      }
    }
    %>        
    //Otros Campos
    //Fecha Utimo Reprecio
    String vFechaUltRe = "<%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", "", "", "((INS  and !TRG) and REW and UPD and UD1 and UD7)")%>";
    vCampoAux = new Campo();
    vCampoAux.SetNumero(1);
    vCampoAux.SetTipoCampo("FECHA_REPRECIO");
    vCampoAux.SetNombreCampo(vFechaUltRe);
    vCampoAux.SetDescCampo("DATE");
    if (vCampoAux.GetNombreCampo().length() > 0) {vListaCampos.add(vCampoAux);}
	
    //Fecha Proximo Reprecio
    String vFechaUltRe = "<%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", "", "", "((INS  and !TRG) and REW and UPD and UD2 and UD4)")%>";
    vCampoAux = new Campo();
    vCampoAux.SetNumero(1);
    vCampoAux.SetTipoCampo("FECHA_PROX_REPRE");
    vCampoAux.SetNombreCampo(vFechaUltRe);
    vCampoAux.SetDescCampo("DATE");
    if (vCampoAux.GetNombreCampo().length() > 0) {vListaCampos.add(vCampoAux);}
	
    //Tipo de interes
    String vFechaUltRe = "<%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", "", "", "((INS  and !TRG) and REW and UPD and UD2 and UD3)")%>";
    vCampoAux = new Campo();
    vCampoAux.SetNumero(1);
    vCampoAux.SetTipoCampo("TIPO_INTERES");
    vCampoAux.SetNombreCampo(vFechaUltRe);
    vCampoAux.SetDescCampo("<%=odiRef.getColList("", "[DEST_CRE_DT]", "", "", "((INS  and !TRG) and REW and UPD and UD2 and UD3)")%>");
    if (vCampoAux.GetNombreCampo().length() > 0) {vListaCampos.add(vCampoAux);}
}

//Nombre de la tabla STG, se limpia en caso de que tenga el nombre del esquema o del dblink
String vNombreTablaSTG = "<%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "A")%>";
vNombreTablaSTG = vNombreTablaSTG.indexOf(".") > -1 ? vNombreTablaSTG.substring(vNombreTablaSTG.indexOf(".") + 1) : vNombreTablaSTG;
vNombreTablaSTG = vNombreTablaSTG.indexOf("@") > -1 ? vNombreTablaSTG.substring(0, vNombreTablaSTG.indexOf("@") - 1) : vNombreTablaSTG;

//Nombre de la tabla de saldos puntuales acumulados, se crea una por cada producto
String vNombreTablaSM = vNombreTablaSTG.length() > 27  ? "SM_" + vNombreTablaSTG.substring(0,27)  : "SM_" + vNombreTablaSTG;

//Fecha para el cual se va crear la tabla temporal de saldos puntuales del da, se toma los dias para diferenciar la distintas tablas de saldos puntuales diarios
String vFechaEjecutar = "#vStgSmFechaProcesar";

//Nombre de la tabla temporal de saldos puntuales del dia extraidos de ods
String vNombreTablaAuxSMExt = vNombreTablaSTG.length() > 24 ? "SM" + vFechaEjecutar.substring(3,5) + "E$" + vNombreTablaSTG.substring(0,24)  : "SM" + vFechaEjecutar.substring(3,5) + "E$" + vNombreTablaSTG;

//Nombre de la tabla temporal de saldos puntuales del dia divido en lotes
String vNombreTablaAuxSM = vNombreTablaSTG.length() > 23 ? "SM" + vFechaEjecutar.substring(3,5) + "$" + vNombreTablaSTG.substring(0,23)  : "SM" + vFechaEjecutar.substring(3,5) + "$" + vNombreTablaSTG;

//Nombre de la tabla temporal que almacena el nmero de lotes generado
String vNombreTablaLotesSM = vNombreTablaSTG.length() > 24  ? "SM" + vFechaEjecutar.substring(3,5) + "L$" + vNombreTablaSTG.substring(0,24)  : "SM" + vFechaEjecutar.substring(3,5) + "L$" + vNombreTablaSTG;

//Nombre del indice de tabla saldos puntuales acumulados
String vNombreIndiceSM = vNombreTablaSM.length() > 24 ? "IDX01_" + vNombreTablaSM.substring(0,24)  : "IDX01_" + vNombreTablaSM;

//Nombre del indice de tabla temporal saldos puntuales dia
String vNombreIndiceAuxSM = vNombreTablaAuxSM.length() > 24 ? "IDX01_" + vNombreTablaAuxSM.substring(0,24)  : "IDX01_" + vNombreTablaAuxSM;

ArrayList vListaCampos = new ArrayList(); //Lista que contiene los campos de saldos puntuales, clave producto y otros campos que no sean saldos medios
consultarCampos(vListaCampos); 

$>
Drop tabla temporal saldos diarios extraidos de ods
Drop tabla temporal saldos diarios dividos en lotes
BCKP Crear tabla saldos puntuales acumulados

create table <$=vNombreTablaSM$> ( FECHA DATE ,CLAVE_PROD <$=vClaveProductoDesc$> --Clave Producto <$vLinea = addStr(vClaveProducto2, ",CLAVE_PROD2 " + vClaveProducto2Desc); $><$=vLinea$> --Clave Producto 2 <$vLinea = addStr(vSaldoPunt1Acum, "," + vSaldoPunt1Acum + " "+ vSaldoPunt1Desc); $><$=vLinea$> --Saldo Puntual 1 Acumulado <$vLinea = addStr(vSaldoPunt1UltHab, "," + vSaldoPunt1UltHab + " "+ vSaldoPunt1Desc); $><$=vLinea$> --Saldo Puntual 1 Ultimo Dia Habil <$vLinea = addStr(vSaldoPunt2Acum, "," + vSaldoPunt2Acum + " "+ vSaldoPunt2Desc); $><$=vLinea$> --Saldo Puntual 2 Acumulado <$vLinea = addStr(vSaldoPunt2UltHab, "," + vSaldoPunt2UltHab + " "+ vSaldoPunt2Desc); $><$=vLinea$> --Saldo Puntual 2 Ultimo Dia Habil <$vLinea = addStr(vSaldoPunt3Acum, "," + vSaldoPunt3Acum + " "+ vSaldoPunt3Desc); $><$=vLinea$> --Saldo Puntual 3 Acumulado <$vLinea = addStr(vSaldoPunt3UltHab, "," + vSaldoPunt3UltHab + " "+ vSaldoPunt3Desc); $><$=vLinea$> --Saldo Puntual 3 Ultimo Dia Habil <$vLinea = addStr(vSaldoPunt3PriorAcum, "," + vSaldoPunt3PriorAcum + " "+ vSaldoPunt3Desc); $><$=vLinea$> --Saldo Puntual 3 Prior Acumulado antes del reprecio <$vLinea = addStr(vSaldoPunt3CurrAcum, "," + vSaldoPunt3CurrAcum + " "+ vSaldoPunt3Desc); $><$=vLinea$> --Saldo Puntual 3 Current Acumulado despues del reprecio <$vLinea = addStr(vSaldoPunt4Acum, "," + vSaldoPunt4Acum + " "+ vSaldoPunt4Desc); $><$=vLinea$> --Saldo Puntual 4 Acumulado <$vLinea = addStr(vSaldoPunt4UltHab, "," + vSaldoPunt4UltHab + " "+ vSaldoPunt4Desc); $><$=vLinea$> --Saldo Puntual 4 Ultimo Dia Habil <$vLinea = addStr(vSaldoPunt5Acum, "," + vSaldoPunt5Acum + " "+ vSaldoPunt5Desc); $><$=vLinea$> --Saldo Puntual 5 Acumulado <$vLinea = addStr(vSaldoPunt5UltHab, "," + vSaldoPunt5UltHab + " "+ vSaldoPunt5Desc); $><$=vLinea$> --Saldo Puntual 5 Ultimo Dia Habil <$vLinea = addStr(vSaldoPunt6Acum, "," + vSaldoPunt6Acum + " "+ vSaldoPunt6Desc); $><$=vLinea$> --Saldo Puntual 6 Acumulado <$vLinea = addStr(vSaldoPunt6UltHab, "," + vSaldoPunt6UltHab + " "+ vSaldoPunt6Desc); $><$=vLinea$> --Saldo Puntual 6 Ultimo Dia Habil <$vLinea = addStr(vSaldoPunt7Acum, "," + vSaldoPunt7Acum + " "+ vSaldoPunt7Desc); $><$=vLinea$> --Saldo Puntual 7 Acumulado <$vLinea = addStr(vSaldoPunt7UltHab, "," + vSaldoPunt7UltHab + " "+ vSaldoPunt7Desc); $><$=vLinea$> --Saldo Puntual 7 Ultimo Dia Habil --<$vLinea = addStr(vFechaUltRe, ",FECHA_ULT_REPRECIO DATE"); $><$=vLinea$> --Fecha del ultimo reprecio <$vLinea = addStr(vFechaUltRe, ",NUM_DIAS_REPRECIO NUMBER(2)"); $><$=vLinea$> --Nmero de dias antes reprecio , "NUM_DIAS" NUMBER(2) --Numero de dias transcurridos desde que inicia el contrato en el mes , "CONTINGENCIA" CHAR(1 BYTE) ) INITRANS 16 NOLOGGING

create table <$=vNombreTablaSM$> ( FECHA DATE, <$getCampos("[CLAVE_PROD_SM] [CLAVE_DESC]", "CLAVE_PRODUCTO", ",", "", ",", " ");$> <$getCampos("[SALDO_ACUM] [SALDO_DESC]", "SALDO_PUNTUAL", ",", "", ",", " ");$> <$getCampos("[SALDO_ULT] [SALDO_DESC]", "SALDO_PUNTUAL", ",", "", ",", " ");$> <$getCampos("[SALDO_PRIOR] [SALDO_DESC]", "SALDO_PUNTUAL", ",", "", ",", " ");$> <$getCampos("[SALDO_CURR] [SALDO_DESC]", "SALDO_PUNTUAL", ",", "", ",", " ");$> <$getCampos("[TIPO_INTERES] [TIPO_INTERES_DESC]", "TIPO_INTERES", "", "", ",", " ");$> <$getCampos("[FECHA_REPRECIO] [FECHA_REPRECIO_DESC]", "FECHA_REPRECIO", "", "", ",", " ");$> <$getCampos("[FECHA_PROX_REPRE] [FECHA_PROX_REPRE_DESC]", "FECHA_PROX_REPRE", "", "", ",", " ");$> <$getCampos("NUM_DIAS_PRIOR NUMBER(2)", "FECHA_REPRECIO", "", "", ",", " ");$> <$getCampos("NUM_DIAS_CURR NUMBER(2)", "FECHA_REPRECIO", "", "", ",", " ");$> "NUM_DIAS" NUMBER(2), --Numero de dias transcurridos desde que inicia el contrato en el mes "CONTINGENCIA" CHAR(1 BYTE) ) INITRANS 16 NOLOGGING
Crear indice tabla saldos puntuales acumulados
CREATE INDEX "STG"."<$=vNombreIndiceSM$>" ON "STG"."<$=vNombreTablaSM$>" <$getCampos("[CLAVE_PROD_SM]", "CLAVE_PRODUCTO", ",", "(", ")", "");$> TABLESPACE TS_STG_INDEX INITRANS 16 NOLOGGING

create table <$=vNombreTablaAuxSM$> ( LOTE NUMBER(10) ,FECHA DATE ,CLAVE_PROD <$=vClaveProductoDesc$> --Clave Producto <$vLinea = addStr(vClaveProducto2, ",CLAVE_PROD2 " + vClaveProducto2Desc); $><$=vLinea$> --Clave Producto 2 <$vLinea = addStr(vSaldoPunt1, "," + vSaldoPunt1 + " "+ vSaldoPunt1Desc); $><$=vLinea$> --Saldo Puntual 1 <$vLinea = addStr(vSaldoPunt2, "," + vSaldoPunt2 + " "+ vSaldoPunt2Desc); $><$=vLinea$> --Saldo Puntual 2 <$vLinea = addStr(vSaldoPunt3, "," + vSaldoPunt3 + " "+ vSaldoPunt3Desc); $><$=vLinea$> --Saldo Puntual 3 <$vLinea = addStr(vSaldoPunt4, "," + vSaldoPunt4 + " "+ vSaldoPunt4Desc); $><$=vLinea$> --Saldo Puntual 4 <$vLinea = addStr(vSaldoPunt5, "," + vSaldoPunt5 + " "+ vSaldoPunt5Desc); $><$=vLinea$> --Saldo Puntual 5 <$vLinea = addStr(vSaldoPunt6, "," + vSaldoPunt6 + " "+ vSaldoPunt6Desc); $><$=vLinea$> --Saldo Puntual 6 <$vLinea = addStr(vSaldoPunt7, "," + vSaldoPunt7 + " "+ vSaldoPunt7Desc); $><$=vLinea$> --Saldo Puntual 7 <$vLinea = addStr(vFechaUltRe, "," + vFechaUltRe + " DATE"); $><$=vLinea$> --Fecha del ultimo reprecio ) INITRANS 16 NOLOGGING
Crear tabla temporal saldos puntuales dia

create table <$=vNombreTablaAuxSM$> ( LOTE NUMBER(10), FECHA DATE, <$getCampos("[CLAVE_PROD_SM] [CLAVE_DESC]", "CLAVE_PRODUCTO", ",", "", ",", " ");$> <$getCampos("[SALDO_PUNT] [SALDO_DESC]", "SALDO_PUNTUAL", ",", "", "", " ");$> <$getCampos("[TIPO_INTERES] [TIPO_INTERES_DESC]", "TIPO_INTERES", "", ",", "", " ");$> <$getCampos("[FECHA_REPRECIO] [FECHA_REPRECIO_DESC]", "FECHA_REPRECIO", "", ",", "", " ");$> <$getCampos("[FECHA_PROX_REPRE] [FECHA_PROX_REPRE_DESC]", "FECHA_PROX_REPRE", "", ",", "", " ");$> ) INITRANS 16 NOLOGGING
Crear indice tabla temporal saldos puntuales dia
CREATE INDEX "STG"."<$=vNombreIndiceAuxSM$>" ON "STG"."<$=vNombreTablaAuxSM$>" <$getCampos("[CLAVE_PROD_SM]", "CLAVE_PRODUCTO", ",", "(", ")", "");$> TABLESPACE TS_STG_INDEX INITRANS 16 NOLOGGING
create table <$=vNombreTablaLotesSM$> ( LOTE NUMBER(10) ,THREAD NUMBER(10) ,STATUS VARCHAR2(20) ) INITRANS 16 NOLOGGING
Crear tabla nombre campos saldos puntuales

CREATE TABLE "STG"."BAN_SM_CAMPOS" ( "TABLA_STG" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE), "NOMBRE_CAMPO" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE), "DESC_CAMPO" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE), "TIPO_CAMPO" VARCHAR2(50 BYTE), "NUMERO" NUMBER(5,0), "FLAG_REPRECIO" VARCHAR2(1) ) INITRANS 16 NOLOGGING
Crear indice unico tabla campos saldos
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX "STG"."PK_BAN_SM_CAMPOS" ON "STG"."BAN_SM_CAMPOS" ("TABLA_STG", "NOMBRE_CAMPO", "TIPO_CAMPO", "NUMERO") TABLESPACE TS_STG_INDEX INITRANS 16 NOLOGGING

BEGIN <$getCampos("INSERT /*+ APPEND */ INTO BAN_SM_CAMPOS VALUES ('#vStgNombreTablaStg', '[CLAVE_PROD]', '[CLAVE_DESC]', 'CLAVE_PRODUCTO', [CLAVE_PROD_NUM], NULL); ", "CLAVE_PRODUCTO", "", "", "", " ");$> <$getCampos("INSERT /*+ APPEND */ INTO BAN_SM_CAMPOS VALUES ('#vStgNombreTablaStg', '[SALDO_PUNT]', '[SALDO_DESC]', 'SALDO_PUNTUAL', [SALDO_NUM], decode(length('[FLAG_REPRECIO]'), NULL, NULL, 'Y')); ", "SALDO_PUNTUAL", "", "", "", " ");$> <$getCampos("INSERT /*+ APPEND */ INTO BAN_SM_CAMPOS VALUES ('#vStgNombreTablaStg', '[FECHA_REPRECIO]', '[FECHA_REPRECIO_DESC]', 'FECHA_REPRECIO', 1, NULL); ", "FECHA_REPRECIO", "", "", "", " ");$> <$getCampos("INSERT /*+ APPEND */ INTO BAN_SM_CAMPOS VALUES ('#vStgNombreTablaStg', '[FECHA_PROX_REPRE]', '[FECHA_PROX_REPRE_DESC]', 'FECHA_PROX_REPRE', 1, NULL); ", "FECHA_PROX_REPRE", "", "", "", " ");$> <$getCampos("INSERT /*+ APPEND */ INTO BAN_SM_CAMPOS VALUES ('#vStgNombreTablaStg', '[TIPO_INTERES]', '[TIPO_INTERES_DESC]', 'TIPO_INTERES', 1, NULL); ", "TIPO_INTERES", "", "", "", " ");$> END;

<@ if ("#vStgSmFlagDiaFeriado".equals("y")) { @> --Si el dia es feriado INSERT /*+ APPEND */ into <$=vNombreTablaAuxSM$> ( LOTE, FECHA, CLAVE_PROD <$vLinea = addStr(vClaveProducto2, ", CLAVE_PROD2"); $><$=vLinea$> ) SELECT NTILE(CEIL(saldos_ods_lote.total_filas/#vStgSmLotSize)) OVER (partition by CEIL(saldos_ods_lote.total_filas/#vStgSmLotSize) order by saldos_ods_lote.numero_fila asc) as lote ,to_date('#vStgSmFechaProcesar', 'dd/mm/yy') fecha <$vLinea= addStr(vClaveProducto, ", CLAVE_PROD ");$><$=vLinea$> <$vLinea= addStr(vClaveProducto2, ", CLAVE_PROD2");$><$=vLinea$> FROM ( SELECT MAX(numero_fila) OVER () as total_filas, saldos_ods.* FROM ( SELECT rownum numero_fila ,to_date('#vStgSmFechaProcesar', 'dd/mm/yy') fecha <$vLinea= addStr(vClaveProducto, ", CLAVE_PROD ");$><$=vLinea$> <$vLinea= addStr(vClaveProducto2, ", CLAVE_PROD2");$><$=vLinea$> FROM <$=vNombreTablaSM$> WHERE contingencia IS NULL AND trunc(to_date(fecha, 'dd/mm/yy'), 'MM') = decode(to_date('#vStgSmFechaProcesar', 'dd/mm/yy'), trunc(to_date('#vStgSmFechaProcesar', 'dd/mm/yy'), 'MM'), trunc(to_date('#vStgSmFechaProcesar', 'dd/mm/yy') - 1, 'MM'), trunc(to_date('#vStgSmFechaProcesar', 'dd/mm/yy'), 'MM')) ) saldos_ods ) saldos_ods_lote <@}@>

<@ if ("#vStgSmFlagDiaFeriado".equals("y")) { @> --extrae los contratos del ultimo dia habil de la tabla de saldos acumulados de stg si el dia es feriado
create table <$=vNombreTablaAuxSMExt$> as SELECT rownum numero_fila, to_date('#vStgSmFechaProcesar', '#vStgFormatoFecha') fecha, <$getCampos("[CLAVE_PROD_SM]", "CLAVE_PRODUCTO", ",", "", "", " ");$> FROM <$=vNombreTablaSM$> WHERE contingencia IS NULL AND trunc(to_date(fecha, '#vStgFormatoFecha'), 'MM') = decode(to_date('#vStgSmFechaProcesar', '#vStgFormatoFecha'), trunc(to_date('#vStgSmFechaProcesar', '#vStgFormatoFecha'), 'MM'), trunc(to_date('#vStgSmFechaProcesar', '#vStgFormatoFecha') - 1, 'MM'), trunc(to_date('#vStgSmFechaProcesar', '#vStgFormatoFecha'), 'MM'))
<@}@>

vSaldoPunt3);$><$=vLinea$> <$vLinea= addStr(vSaldoPunt4, ", " + vSaldoPunt4);$><$=vLinea$> <$vLinea= addStr(vSaldoPunt5, ", " + vSaldoPunt5);$><$=vLinea$> <$vLinea= addStr(vSaldoPunt6, ", " + vSaldoPunt6);$><$=vLinea$> <$vLinea= addStr(vSaldoPunt7, ", " + vSaldoPunt7);$><$=vLinea$> <$vLinea = addStr(vFechaUltRe, ", " + vFechaUltRe);$><$=vLinea$> ) select NTILE(CEIL(saldos_ods_lote.total_filas/#vStgSmLotSize)) OVER (partition by CEIL(saldos_ods_lote.total_filas/#vStgSmLotSize) order by saldos_ods_lote.numero_fila asc) as lote ,to_date('#vStgSmFechaProcesar', 'dd/mm/yy') fecha <$vLinea= addStr(vClaveProducto, ", " + vClaveProducto);$><$=vLinea$> <$vLinea= addStr(vClaveProducto2, ", " + vClaveProducto2);$><$=vLinea$> <$vLinea= addStr(vSaldoPunt1, ", saldos_ods_lote." + vSaldoPunt1);$><$=vLinea$> <$vLinea= addStr(vSaldoPunt2, ", saldos_ods_lote." + vSaldoPunt2);$><$=vLinea$> <$vLinea= addStr(vSaldoPunt3, ", saldos_ods_lote." + vSaldoPunt3);$><$=vLinea$> <$vLinea= addStr(vSaldoPunt4, ", saldos_ods_lote." + vSaldoPunt4);$><$=vLinea$> <$vLinea= addStr(vSaldoPunt5, ", saldos_ods_lote." + vSaldoPunt5);$><$=vLinea$> <$vLinea= addStr(vSaldoPunt6, ", saldos_ods_lote." + vSaldoPunt6);$><$=vLinea$> <$vLinea= addStr(vSaldoPunt7, ", saldos_ods_lote." + vSaldoPunt7);$><$=vLinea$> <$vLinea= addStr(vFechaUltRe, ", " + vFechaUltRe);$><$=vLinea$> from ( select max(numero_fila) OVER () as total_filas, saldos_ods.* from ( select rownum numero_fila ,to_date('#vStgSmFechaProcesar', 'dd/mm/yy') fecha <$vLinea= addStr(vClaveProducto, ", " + vClaveProducto);$><$=vLinea$> <$vLinea= addStr(vClaveProducto2, ", " + vClaveProducto2);$><$=vLinea$> <$vLinea= addStr(vSaldoPunt1, ", " + vSaldoPunt1);$><$=vLinea$> <$vLinea= addStr(vSaldoPunt2, ", " + vSaldoPunt2);$><$=vLinea$> <$vLinea= addStr(vSaldoPunt3, ", " + vSaldoPunt3);$><$=vLinea$> <$vLinea= addStr(vSaldoPunt4, ", " + vSaldoPunt4);$><$=vLinea$> <$vLinea= addStr(vSaldoPunt5, ", " + vSaldoPunt5);$><$=vLinea$> <$vLinea= addStr(vSaldoPunt6, ", " + vSaldoPunt6);$><$=vLinea$> <$vLinea= addStr(vSaldoPunt7, ", " + vSaldoPunt7);$><$=vLinea$> <$vLinea= addStr(vFechaUltRe, ", " + vFechaUltRe);$><$=vLinea$> FROM ( <%for (int i=odiRef.getDataSetMin(); i <= odiRef.getDataSetMax(); i++){%> <%=odiRef.getDataSet(i, "Operator")%> select <%=odiRef.getPop("DISTINCT_ROWS")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(i,"", "[EXPRESSION] [COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "", "((INS ) and REW)")%> from <%=odiRef.getFrom(i)%> where <% if (odiRef.getDataSet(i, "HAS_JRN").equals("1")) { %> JRN_FLAG <> 'D' <%} else {%> (1=1) <% } %> <%=odiRef.getJoin(i)%> <%=odiRef.getFilter(i)%> <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter(i)%> <%=odiRef.getGrpBy(i)%> <%=odiRef.getHaving(i)%> <%}%> ) <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> ODI_GET_FROM ) saldos_ods ) saldos_ods_lote <@}@>

<@ if ("#vStgSmFlagDiaFeriado".equals("n")) { @> --extrae los saldos de ods si el dia es habil
create table <$=vNombreTablaAuxSMExt$> as select rownum numero_fila, to_date('#vStgSmFechaProcesar', '#vStgFormatoFecha') fecha, <$getCampos("[CLAVE_PROD]", "CLAVE_PRODUCTO", ",", "", ",", " ");$> <$getCampos("[SALDO_PUNT]", "SALDO_PUNTUAL", ",", "", "", " ");$> <$getCampos("[TIPO_INTERES]", "TIPO_INTERES", "", ",", "", " ");$> <$getCampos("[FECHA_REPRECIO]", "FECHA_REPRECIO", "", ",", "", " ");$> <$getCampos("[FECHA_PROX_REPRE]", "FECHA_PROX_REPRE", "", ",", "", " ");$> from ( <%for (int i=odiRef.getDataSetMin(); i <= odiRef.getDataSetMax(); i++){%> <%=odiRef.getDataSet(i, "Operator")%> select <%=odiRef.getPop("DISTINCT_ROWS")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(i,"", "[EXPRESSION] [COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "", "((INS ) and REW)")%> from <%=odiRef.getFrom(i)%> where <% if (odiRef.getDataSet(i, "HAS_JRN").equals("1")) { %> JRN_FLAG <> 'D' <%} else {%> (1=1) <% } %> <%=odiRef.getJoin(i)%> <%=odiRef.getFilter(i)%> <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter(i)%> <%=odiRef.getGrpBy(i)%> <%=odiRef.getHaving(i)%> <%}%>)
<@}@>

insert /*+ APPEND */ into <$=vNombreTablaLotesSM$> ( LOTE, STATUS ) select distinct LOTE, 'POR PROCESAR' STATUS from <$=vNombreTablaAuxSM$> union select null LOTE, 'POR PROCESAR' STATUS from dual order by LOTE asc
OLD Declaracion de variables saldos medios (BeanShell)

<$
import Java.lang.*;

//Funcin que devuelve el String vStr, si la variable vVariable no est vacia, se utiliza para imprimir condicionalmente las lineas en los pasos del mdulo.
public static String addStr(String vVarible, String vStr){
     if (vVarible.length() > 0) {return vStr;}
     return "";
}

//Variables utilizada para "imprimir" el nombre de las lineas escritas en java en el mdulo de conocimiento
String vLinea = ""; 

//Nombre de la tabla STG, se limpia en caso de que tenga el nombre del esquema o del dblink
String vNombreTablaSTG = "<%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "A")%>";
vNombreTablaSTG = vNombreTablaSTG.indexOf(".") > -1 ? vNombreTablaSTG.substring(vNombreTablaSTG.indexOf(".") + 1) : vNombreTablaSTG;
vNombreTablaSTG = vNombreTablaSTG.indexOf("@") > -1 ? vNombreTablaSTG.substring(0, vNombreTablaSTG.indexOf("@") - 1) : vNombreTablaSTG;

//Nombre de la tabla de saldos puntuales acumulados, se crea una por cada producto
String vNombreTablaSM = vNombreTablaSTG.length() > 27  ? "SM_" + vNombreTablaSTG.substring(0,27)  : "SM_" + vNombreTablaSTG;

//Fecha para el cual se va crear la tabla temporal de saldos puntuales del da, se toma los dias para diferenciar la distintas tablas de saldos puntuales diarios
String vFechaEjecutar = "#vStgSmFechaProcesar";

//Nombre de la tabla temporal de saldos puntuales del da
String vNombreTablaAuxSM = vNombreTablaSTG.length() > 23 ? "SM" + vFechaEjecutar.substring(0,2) + "$" + vNombreTablaSTG.substring(0,23)  : "SM" + vFechaEjecutar.substring(0,2) + "$" + vNombreTablaSTG;

//Nombre de la tabla temporal que almacena el nmero de lotes generado
String vNombreTablaLotesSM = vNombreTablaSTG.length() > 24  ? "SM" + vFechaEjecutar.substring(0,2) + "L$" + vNombreTablaSTG.substring(0,24)  : "SM" + vFechaEjecutar.substring(0,2) + "L$" + vNombreTablaSTG;

//Nombre del indice de tabla saldos puntuales acumulados
String vNombreIndiceSM = vNombreTablaSM.length() > 24 ? "IDX01_" + vNombreTablaSTG.substring(0,24)  : "IDX01_" + vNombreTablaSM;

//Nombre del indice de tabla temporal saldos puntuales dia
String vNombreIndiceAuxSM = vNombreTablaAuxSM.length() > 24 ? "IDX01_" + vNombreTablaSTG.substring(0,24)  : "IDX01_" + vNombreTablaAuxSM;

//Clave Producto
String vClaveProducto = "<%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", "", "", "((INS  and !TRG) and REW and UPD and UD1 and UD2)")%>".trim();
String vClaveProductoDesc = "<%=odiRef.getColList("", "[DEST_CRE_DT]", "", "", "((INS  and !TRG) and REW and UPD and UD1 and UD2)")%>";

//Clave Producto 2
String vClaveProducto2 = "<%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", "", "", "((INS  and !TRG) and REW and UPD and UD1 and UD4)")%>".trim();
String vClaveProducto2Desc = "<%=odiRef.getColList("", "[DEST_CRE_DT]", "", "", "((INS  and !TRG) and REW and UPD and UD1 and UD4)")%>";

//Fecha Utimo Reprecio
String vFechaUltRe = "<%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", "", "", "((INS  and !TRG) and REW and UPD and UD1 and UD3)")%>".trim();

/*CAMPOS DE SALDOS PUNTUALES*/
//Saldo Puntual 1
String vSaldoPunt1 = "<%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", "", "", "((INS and !TRG) and REW and !UPD and UD1 and UD2)")%>".trim();
String vSaldoPunt1Desc = "<%=odiRef.getColList("", "[DEST_CRE_DT]", "", "", "((INS and !TRG) and REW and !UPD and UD1 and UD2)")%>";
String vSaldoPunt1Acum = vSaldoPunt1.length() > 24  ? vSaldoPunt1.substring(0,24) + "_AC1" : addStr(vSaldoPunt1 ,vSaldoPunt1 + "_AC1");
String vSaldoPunt1UltHab = vSaldoPunt1.length() > 24  ? vSaldoPunt1.substring(0,24) + "_UH1" : addStr(vSaldoPunt1 ,vSaldoPunt1 + "_UH1");

//Saldo Puntual 2

import Java.lang.*;

//Funcin que devuelve el String vStr, si la variable vVariable no est vacia, se utiliza para imprimir condicionalmente las lineas en los pasos del mdulo.
public static String addStr(String vVarible, String vStr){
     if (vVarible.length() > 0) {return vStr;}
     return "";
}

//Variables utilizada para "imprimir" el nombre de las lineas escritas en java en el mdulo de conocimiento
String vLinea = ""; 

//Nombre de la tabla STG, se limpia en caso de que tenga el nombre del esquema o del dblink
String vNombreTablaSTG = "<%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "A")%>";
vNombreTablaSTG = vNombreTablaSTG.indexOf(".") > -1 ? vNombreTablaSTG.substring(vNombreTablaSTG.indexOf(".") + 1) : vNombreTablaSTG;
vNombreTablaSTG = vNombreTablaSTG.indexOf("@") > -1 ? vNombreTablaSTG.substring(0, vNombreTablaSTG.indexOf("@") - 1) : vNombreTablaSTG;

//Nombre de la tabla de saldos puntuales acumulados, se crea una por cada producto
String vNombreTablaSM = vNombreTablaSTG.length() > 27  ? "SM_" + vNombreTablaSTG.substring(0,27)  : "SM_" + vNombreTablaSTG;

//Fecha para el cual se va crear la tabla temporal de saldos puntuales del da, se toma los dias para diferenciar la distintas tablas de saldos puntuales diarios
String vFechaEjecutar = "#vStgSmFechaProcesar";

//Nombre de la tabla temporal de saldos puntuales del da
String vNombreTablaAuxSM = vNombreTablaSTG.length() > 25 ? "SM" + vFechaEjecutar.substring(0,2) + "$" + vNombreTablaSTG.substring(0,24)  : "SM" + vFechaEjecutar.substring(0,2) + "$" + vNombreTablaSTG;

//Nombre de la tabla temporal que almacena el nmero de lotes generado
String vNombreTablaLotesSM = vNombreTablaSTG.length() > 24  ? "SM" + vFechaEjecutar.substring(0,2) + "L$" + vNombreTablaSTG.substring(0,24)  : "SM" + vFechaEjecutar.substring(0,2) + "L$" + vNombreTablaSTG;

//Nombre del indice de tabla saldos puntuales acumulados
String vNombreIndiceSM = vNombreTablaSM.length() > 24 ? "IDX01_" + vNombreTablaSTG.substring(0,24)  : "IDX01_" + vNombreTablaSM;

//Nombre del indice de tabla temporal saldos puntuales dia

COMPONENT NAME: IKM SQL Control Append
AUTHOR: Oracle
Description : - Integration Knowledge Module - Integrates data in any ISO-92 compliant database target table in truncate / insert (append) mode. - Data can be controlled. Invalid data is isolated in the Error Table and can be recycled.
Restrictions: - When working with journalized data, if the "Synchronize deletions from journal" is executed, the deleted rows on the target are committed regardless of the COMMIT option - The TRUNCATE option is not implemented on all RDBMs - The TRUNCATE option cannot work if the target table is referenced by another table (foreign key) - When using the RECYCLE_ERRORS option, you have to set an Update Key for your interface. - When using this module with a journalized source table, data are automatically filtered to not include source deletions. - The FLOW_CONTROL and STATIC_CONTROL options call the Check Knowledge Module to isolate invalid data (if no CKM is set, an error occurs). Both options must be set to NO in the case when an Integration Interface populates a TEMPORARY target datastore.
0 - DELETE ALL 1- DELETE BY CONDITION (Borra en la tabla segn valor marcado con UD3, busca ese valor dentro de la tabla target) No activa 2 - DELETE ALL (ELSE)
Automatically attempts to insert data into the Target Datastore of the Interface
Commit all data inserted in the target datastore.
Check this option if you wish to perform flow control.
Check this option to recycle data rejected by flow control in a previous execution of this interface.
Check this option to control the target table after having inserted or updated target data.
Check this option if you wish to truncate the target datastore.
Check this option if you wish to delete all the rows of the target datastore.
Check this option if you wish to create the target table
Set this option to NO if you wish to retain temporary objects (tables, files and scripts) after integration. Useful for debugging.

<%if ( odiRef.getUserExit("FLOW_CONTROL").equals("1") ) { %> insert /*+ APPEND */ into <%=odiRef.getTable("L","TARG_NAME","A")%><@if (#SIG.vStgNumLote>0) { @>_#SIG.vStgNumLote<@}@> ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "((INS and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(",", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "((INS and TRG) and REW)")%> ) select <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "((INS and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(",", "[EXPRESSION]", ",
	", "", "((INS and TRG) and REW)")%> from <$=<%=odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "A")%>$><@if (#SIG.vStgNumLote>0) { @>_#SIG.vStgNumLote<@}@> <% } else { %> insert /*+ APPEND */ into <%=odiRef.getTable("L","TARG_NAME","A")%><@if (#SIG.vStgNumLote>0) { @>_#SIG.vStgNumLote<@}@> ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "((INS and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(",", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "((INS and TRG) and REW)")%> )
select <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "((INS and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(",", "[EXPRESSION]", ",
	", "", "((INS and TRG) and REW)")%> FROM ( <%for (int i=odiRef.getDataSetMin(); i <= odiRef.getDataSetMax(); i++){%> <%=odiRef.getDataSet(i, "Operator")%> select <%=odiRef.getPop("DISTINCT_ROWS")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(i,"", "[EXPRESSION] [COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "((INS and !TRG) and REW)")%> from <%=odiRef.getFrom(i)%> where <% if (odiRef.getDataSet(i, "HAS_JRN").equals("1")) { %> JRN_FLAG <> 'D' <%} else {%> (1=1) <% } %> <%=odiRef.getJoin(i)%> <%=odiRef.getFilter(i)%> <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter(i)%> <%=odiRef.getGrpBy(i)%> <%=odiRef.getHaving(i)%> <%}%> ) <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> ODI_GET_FROM
<% } %>

<% if ("C".equals(odiRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_METHOD"))) { %> /* Consistant journalization detected. */ /* Lock should be done by a specific step in a package */ <% } else { %> delete from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","JRN_NAME","A")%> where JRN_CONSUMED = '1' <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter()%> <% } %>

create table <$=<%=odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "A")%>$><@if (#SIG.vStgNumLote>0) { @>_#SIG.vStgNumLote<@}@> ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]\t[DEST_WRI_DT] " + odiRef.getInfo("DEST_DDL_NULL"), ",\n\t", "", "INS or UPD")%> ) INITRANS 16 NOLOGGING

<%if ("C".equals(odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_METHOD"))){%> /* Consistant journalization detected. */ /* Lock should be done by a specific step in a package */ <% } else { %> update <%=odiRef.getTable( "L" , "JRN_NAME" , "A" )%> set JRN_CONSUMED = '1' where (1=1) <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter()%> <% } %>

insert /*+ APPEND */ into <$=<%=odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "A")%>$><@if (#SIG.vStgNumLote>0) { @>_#SIG.vStgNumLote<@}@> ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t", "","((INS and !TRG) and REW)")%> ) <%for (int i=odiRef.getDataSetMin(); i <= odiRef.getDataSetMax(); i++){%> <%=odiRef.getDataSet(i, "Operator")%> select <%=odiRef.getPop("DISTINCT_ROWS")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(i,"", "[EXPRESSION]", ",\n\t", "", "((INS and !TRG) and REW)")%> from <%=odiRef.getFrom(i)%> where <% if (odiRef.getDataSet(i, "HAS_JRN").equals("1")) { %> JRN_FLAG <> 'D' <%} else {%> (1=1) <% } %> <%=odiRef.getJoin(i)%> <%=odiRef.getFilter(i)%> <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter(i)%> <%=odiRef.getGrpBy(i)%> <%=odiRef.getHaving(i)%> <%}%>

<%if ( odiRef.getUserExit("FLOW_CONTROL").equals("1") ) { %> insert into <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","W")%> ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "INS and REW")%> ) select DISTINCT <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "INS and REW")%> from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> E where not exists ( select 'X' from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","W")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> T where <%=odiRef.getColList("", "T.[COL_NAME]	= E.[COL_NAME]", "
		and	", "", "UK")%> ) and E.ODI_ORIGIN = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ORIGIN")%>' and E.ODI_ERR_TYPE = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ERR_TYPE")%>' <% } %>

<%if (odiRef.getOption ("OPTION_TRUNCATE").equals("1")) {%> alter table <%=odiRef.getTable("L","TARG_NAME","A")%> truncate partition #vStgFechaTrunc <%} else {%> truncate table <%=odiRef.getTable("L","TARG_NAME","A")%><@if (#SIG.vStgNumLote>0) { @>_#SIG.vStgNumLote<@}@> <%}%>

UPDATE STG.BAN_CONFIG_SALDO_MEDIO SET BCSM_STATUS_SM = CASE WHEN '#vStgSmStatusContingencia' = 'NUEVA' THEN 'CONTINGENCIA' WHEN '#vStgSmStatusContingencia' = 'RESUELTA' THEN 'PROCESADO' ELSE 'PROCESADO' END , BCSM_FLAG_PROCESANDO = null , BCSM_STATUS_CONTINGENCIA = null WHERE BCSM_SOURCE = '#vStgNombreTablaStg' AND BCSM_FECHA = TO_DATE('#vStgSmFechaProcesar', '#vStgFormatoFecha') AND BCSM_FLAG_PROCESANDO = 'y'

UPDATE STG.BAN_CONFIG_SALDO_MEDIO SET BCSM_FLAG_PROCESANDO = 'y' WHERE BCSM_STATUS_SM = '#vStgSmTipoStatus' AND BCSM_SOURCE = '#vStgNombreTablaStg' AND BCSM_FECHA = TO_DATE('#vStgSmFechaProcesar', '#vStgFormatoFecha') AND BCSM_FLAG_PROCESANDO IS NULL
Marcar si hay nueva o se resolvio contingencia segun extraccion ODS

BEGIN IF ('#vStgSmFlagDiaFeriado' = 'n') THEN IF ('#vStgSmTipoStatus' = 'CONTINGENCIA') THEN --Si no se resolvio la contingencia, se mantiene colocandola como CONTINGENCIA_PROCESADO IF (#vStgSmValidarPredecesores != 1) THEN UPDATE STG.BAN_CONFIG_SALDO_MEDIO SET BCSM_STATUS_SM = 'CONTINGENCIA_PROCESADO' , BCSM_FLAG_PROCESANDO = null , BCSM_STATUS_CONTINGENCIA = null WHERE BCSM_SOURCE = '#vStgNombreTablaStg' AND BCSM_FECHA = TO_DATE('#vStgSmFechaProcesar', '#vStgFormatoFecha') AND BCSM_FLAG_PROCESANDO = 'y'; ELSE --Si se resolvio la contingencia (los datos extraidos de ods corresponden con la fecha que se esta procesando) IF (TO_DATE('#vStgSmFechaProcesar', '#vStgFormatoFecha') = TO_DATE('#vStgFechaCarga', '#vStgFormatoFecha')) THEN UPDATE STG.BAN_CONFIG_SALDO_MEDIO SET BCSM_STATUS_SM = 'POR PROCESAR', BCSM_STATUS_CONTINGENCIA = 'RESUELTA' WHERE BCSM_STATUS_SM = '#vStgSmTipoStatus' AND BCSM_SOURCE = '#vStgNombreTablaStg' AND BCSM_FECHA = TO_DATE('#vStgSmFechaProcesar', '#vStgFormatoFecha'); END IF; END IF; END IF;
IF ('#vStgSmTipoStatus' = 'POR PROCESAR') THEN --Si fecha de carga es menor a la fecha que se esta procesando, nueva contingencia. IF (TO_DATE('#vStgSmFechaProcesar', '#vStgFormatoFecha') > TO_DATE('#vStgFechaCarga', '#vStgFormatoFecha') AND #vStgSmFlagContingencia IN (1, -1)) THEN UPDATE STG.BAN_CONFIG_SALDO_MEDIO SET BCSM_STATUS_SM = 'CONTINGENCIA', BCSM_STATUS_CONTINGENCIA = 'NUEVA' WHERE BCSM_STATUS_SM = '#vStgSmTipoStatus' AND BCSM_SOURCE = '#vStgNombreTablaStg' AND BCSM_FECHA = TO_DATE('#vStgSmFechaProcesar', '#vStgFormatoFecha'); END IF; END IF; END IF; END;
UPDATE STG.BAN_CONFIG_SALDO_MEDIO SET BCSM_STATUS_SM = 'CONTINGENCIA' WHERE BCSM_SOURCE = '#vStgNombreTablaStg' AND BCSM_STATUS_SM = 'CONTINGENCIA_PROCESADO'

<@ if ("#vStgSmTipoStatus".equals("CONTINGENCIA")) { @> UPDATE stg.ban_config_saldo_medio SET bcsm_flag_procesando = null ,bcsm_status_contingencia = null WHERE bcsm_source = '#vStgNombreTablaStg' AND bcsm_status_sm = 'CONTINGENCIA' <@}@> <@ if ("#vStgSmTipoStatus".equals("POR PROCESAR")) { @> UPDATE stg.ban_config_saldo_medio SET bcsm_status_sm = 'ERROR' ,bcsm_flag_procesando = null ,bcsm_status_contingencia = null WHERE bcsm_source = '#vStgNombreTablaStg' AND bcsm_status_sm = 'POR PROCESAR' <@}@>
